person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The ratification of the treaty , which was signed in 1993 by the then right-centrist government , is being delayed by an ex-communist party , which won parliamentary elections in the same year and now dominates parliament .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| the then right-centrist government |
| an ex-communist party |

These are the valid entities that can be identified as "Person" from the given paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| the then right-centrist government |
| an ex-communist party |

These are the entities that clearly refer to "Person" in the given paragraph. The indefinite article "an" before "ex-communist party" indicates that we are referring to a specific group of people who make up the party.
